item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Home
item.description: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte is currently working as Associate Professor in School of Electronics and Communication Engineering, REVA University, Bengaluru, India. He is Heading III Year Undergraduate Program for ECE at REVA University, Bengaluru, India. He is Senior Member-IEEE, An Active Researcher, Good Motivator, Counsellor for ECE Undergraduate Students at REVA University.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering| About
item.description: I always Believe the foundation for becoming an Engineer is the Love for Mathematics. I always encourage my students to take up Mathematics to become a Designer, Innovator, Creator of Technology.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Academics
item.description: Manjunath Kounte received Best Teacher Award for the Year 2017 at REVA University. He teaches Programming and Mathematical Oriented Courses like Digital Signal Processing, Signals and Systems, Electrical Circuit Analysis, Programming in C++, Microcontrollers, Microprocessors etc.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Research Lab
item.description: Dr. Manjunath Kounte's research interests include Signal Processing, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Blockchain Technology, Fog Computing, Edge Computing, Internet of Things, Internet of Vehicles.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Gallery
item.description: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Gallery

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Testimonials
item.description: Dr Manjunath or Kounte sir as we fondly call him, is a terrific human being, close friend, mentor and an inspiration

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Internet of Things
item.description: IoT can be defined as creation of dynamic global network infrastructure, by interconnecting the physical and virtual things such as ZigBee, Global Positioning System (GPS), RFID, sensors etc.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Intelligent Systems
item.description: Machine Learning is a branch of artificial intelligence (AI) to learn the data, identify the pattern and to make decisions with minimal human intervention.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Blockchain Technology
item.description: Blockchain is a distributed and decentralized database (ledger) that keeps on updating digital records of who owns what.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Computer Networking
item.description: Computer networks allow the user to access remote programs and remote databases either of the same organization or from other enterprises or public sources.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Communication
item.description: The facts are that digital methods of communication are faster, more versatile, practical and streamlined, so it is perhaps unsurprising that once the technology became available, we began quickly moving into the digital age. We cannot deny that at this point we need digital communication.

item.title: Dr. Manjunath R Kounte | REVA University | School of Electronics and Communication Engineering | Embedded Systems
item.description: Embedded systems are where the software meet the physical world. As we put tiny computers into all sorts of systems (door locks, airplanes, pacemakers), how we implement the software is truly, terrifyingly important.
